channel.title: Help with runserver in Project16 V.6 source
channel.description:
Hello all,i have succesfully downloaded the source of Project16 V.6 but when i try opening the file.It quickly shows then exits.I have managed to capture a screenshot of it right before it exits.In green letters,it says 'java' is not reconized as an internal or external command,operable program or batch file.
This is what i have in the runserver file... [code]This is what i have in the runserver file... Code: @echo off color 0a title Server java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server[/code] Do i add/edit anything to that?

item.title: Help with runserver in Project16 V.6 source
item.dc:creator: @A_L_I_V_E A L I V E
item.description:
@A_L_I_V_E wrote:

Nope sorry,That doesn’t help

Please try to come up with ideas so i can run the server.Thanks XD

Sam A.K.A A L I V E[br][size=1]Posted on: October 30, 2007, 03:36:40 PM[/size][hr]UPDATE! I have gotten some help on the AARscape fourms if you guys don’t mind.Anyways,Gunnerman7 gave me a good runserver thingy.I have loaded it up and it seems to be working fine.I may need more help soon.Anyways,I need you guys to help me figure out where does Server Owner/Admin go.Here is the code i pasted from Client.Java [code]//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

checkmods();
checkadmins();
checkstaff();
if(checkmods() == 5)
playerRights = 1;
if(checkadmins() == 5)
playerRights = 2;
playerRights = 3;
[/code]
Can anyone tell me i write the names next to the 3; or somewhere else.
Thanks XD
Sam A.K.A A L I V E

Read full topic

item.title: Help with runserver in Project16 V.6 source
item.dc:creator: @lostandfound lostandfound
item.description:
@lostandfound wrote:

Try that

@echo off color 0C title Server java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
